By NAPS br  North American Precis Syndicate

NAPSIThose seeking memorable outdoor experiences can find oneofakind destinationsmany with a Colonial feelin the Valley Forge and Montgomery County area of southeastern Pennsylvania PERIOD Here are a few examples PERIOD

The  acres of Valley Forge National Historical Park include nearly  miles of marked trails for hiking jogging or biking PERIOD The Joseph Plumb Martin Trail is a .6mile loop past several historical landmarks PERIOD

Visitors can glide over to the John James Audubon Center at Mill Grove PERIOD There canoes paddles and life vests are available for a leisurely trip down the nearby Perkiomen Creek PERIOD Each trip comes complete with its own naturalist who can point out the areas highlights PERIOD

Montgomery County also offers a robust network of trails for hiking biking and horseback riding PERIOD The Perkiomen Trail winds on a pathway that once held the tracks of the Reading Railroad PERIOD

Learn more at a hrefhttpwww.valleyforge.orgwww.valleyforge.orga or follow news about events in the region in the blog The Pursuit a hrefhttpthepursuit.valleyforge.orgthepursuit.valleyforge.orga PERIOD
